name: Magnate: Robot Idle Tycoon
summary: Start at the bottom selling old machine parts and junk droids and... tap, tap, tap your way to your very own cyberpunk empire! Before you know it you’ll be able to hire managers to do the hard graft for you, and with billions banked, you must face the ultimate fat cat dilemma; take the path of GOOD or EVIL in your pursuit of even greater fortune?
